title: Lakshmi Kasula Haaram with Emerald and Ruby Accents
features: This Kasula Haaram features meticulously crafted Lakshmi motifs (Kasulu) along the neckline, interspersed with delicate filigree work. The central pendant showcases intricate floral designs set with CZ diamonds and is adorned with a vibrant Emerald and Ruby. The pendant's outline is embellished with pearl drops. Traditional South Indian design with a modern, lightweight feel.
occasions: and traditional South Indian celebrations like Seemantham (శ్రీమంతం ) or Half-Saree Function (పట్టు లంగా వేడుక). Can also be styled for modern semi-formal events.
description: This Haaram is a beautiful blend of tradition and contemporary elegance. The Lakshmi motifs symbolize prosperity and good fortune, making it a meaningful heirloom piece. The high-quality Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, while the strategically placed Emerald and Ruby add a touch of regal charm. The design is lightweight and comfortable for extended wear, ensuring you look and feel your best.
